##Problem 3

```{r}
Vec<-(1:100)
sum(Vec)
```
##Problem 4
Summing using For Loop
```{r}
Numbers<-c()
Sum<-0
for (i in 1:100){
  if(i%%1==0){
    Numbers<-c(Numbers,i)
    Sum<-Sum+i
    
  }
}

 print(Sum) 
```
